betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The betrayal of Haven, when a piece of the Twilight Horde deflected to the Shyre Empire, together with the transfer of knowledge regarding Warren magic, also involved some knowledge gained from the conquest of Asgard, now Arcana.
Not unlike me, at the peak of their power, the Aesir deviced a furnace, one in tune with recursion, and capable of exciting many magical fields.
I am not quite sure what the intended purpose of this furnace may have been, but for me, its sole use is to treat high-atomic-mass matter.
